description: A React component implementing a chat input with support for connector typeahead triggers (@jira_ and @confluence_), reference selection, and display of selected references as chips.

methods.name: ChatInput
methods.description: React functional component providing a chat input interface with connector triggers and reference selection.

methods.name: syncCaret
methods.description: Synchronize the caret position in the textarea.

methods.name: onChange
methods.description: Handle updates to the textarea value and caret position.

methods.name: insertTokenForReference
methods.description: Insert a structured reference token into the textarea at the trigger position.

methods.name: onSelectFromSelector
methods.description: Handle the selection of a reference from the connector selector.

methods.name: removeRefAt
methods.description: Remove a selected reference by index.
